Module io.github.darvil.lanat
Package io.github.darvil.lanat.parsing.errors.contexts.formatting

Class ErrorFormattingContext

java.lang.Object
io.github.darvil.lanat.parsing.errors.contexts.formatting.ErrorFormattingContext
public class ErrorFormattingContext extends Object
Class used by error handlers to easily format errors to be displayed to the user.
